JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Skilled Warehouse Employees Wanted for Customer in Horsens for Pick/pack for Nightshift
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Skilled Warehouse Employees Wanted for Customer in Horsens for Pick/pack for Nightshift

We are currently looking for skilled warehouse employees for our partners in the Horsens. The tasks are picking/packing on electric pallet runners. We are therefore looking for quality-conscious employees who take pride in the work they do.

Working hours are typically Sunday to Thursday from 20:00 – 04:00 or 21:00 – 05:00

We offer:

  • Full-time position
  • Salary by according to agreement

We expect you…

  • Speaks Danish or English
  • Is ready for physical work

 

If this interests you, then you can apply by clicking on the button "apply for this job", and you will then create a profile on our website.

Would you like to be part of a highly professional environment? Then do not hesitate to send us an application. If you have questions about the above job posting, you are always welcome to contact us by phone: 72 10 85 46.
